intro: Lysimachia × producta, commonly known as the hybrid yellow loosestrife, is a perennial flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It typically grows in moist, shady environments such as woodlands and stream banks. The plant features opposite, heart-shaped leaves and produces clusters of small, yellowish flowers in the summer. It is a member of the Primulaceae family and is characterized by its rhizomatous growth habit. Lysimachia × producta is often used in ornamental gardening for its attractive foliage and floral display.
